snippet: Corey Lewandowski, once a lobbyist, a political operative and a congressional aide who was arrested after he brought a gun to work, is running Donald J. Trump’s bid for president.
abstract: Donald J Trump and his presidential campaign manager Corey Lewandowski share unpredictability and outsider status; Trump, selective in his associations, sees affinity with man whose past has led to mixed reputation in Republican circles.

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett and Steve Eder contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Corey Lewandowski, once a lobbyist, a political operative and a congressional aide who was arrested after he brought a gun to work, is running Donald J. Trump’s bid for president.

headline.main: For His Unconventional Campaign, Donald Trump Looks to an Unorthodox Manager
headline.print_headline: Unorthodox Campaign Has a Manager to Match
